Class SerealizationDriver

java.lang.Object
SerealizationDriver
All Implemented Interfaces:
InterfaceReadWrite
public class SerealizationDriver
extends java.lang.Object
implements InterfaceReadWrite
A class that serialize the ArrayList of Word objects into a words.ser files.
Author:
Medhy DOHOU, Jean-Camille LAPIERRE, Dorian MOUNIER, Cyril PIGEYRE, Gabriel SAPONARA
